page.shortlink: action javascript message box Dropdown style
page.description: Displays a message using a Dropdown Message box.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Message box - DropDown Style]* action can be used to display a Dropdown message on the screen. This message can be displayed as a 'message' (has an OK button), 'confirm' (has an OK and Cancel button), or 'wait' (has no buttons and displays a spinner.)

item.name: Message type
item.description: The type of message to display: 'Message', 'Confirm', or 'Wait'. 'Message' displays the message with an OK button. 'Confirm' displays the message with an OK and Cancel button. 'Wait' displays a wait message. A 'Wait' message can be dismissed by calling the [{dialog.object}.dropDownMessageHide()] JavaScript method.

item.name: Message title
item.description: The message title. The title can include HTML markup.

item.name: Message body
item.description: The message body. The body can include HTML markup.

item.name: Width
item.description: The width of the message box. If the Width is not specified, a default width of '400px' will be used.

item.name: Location
item.description: The message position. Can be 'Top', 'Center', or 'Bottom'. An optional offset can be defined (use absolute CSS units.) The offset is the distance between the message and edge of the screen.

item.name: OK button label
item.description: The text shown on the OK button. This property is only available when *[ui:Message type]* is set to 'Message' or 'Confirm'.

item.name: Cancel button label
item.description: The text shown on the Cancel button. This property is only available when *[ui:Message type]* is set to 'Confirm'.

item.name: onOK Javascript
item.description: JavaScript to execute when the user clicks the OK button. This property is only available when *[ui:Message type]* is set to 'Message' or 'Confirm'.

item.name: onCancel Javascript
item.description: JavaScript to execute when the user clicks the Cancel button. This property is only available when *[ui:Message type]* is set to 'Confirm'.

item.name: Animation style
item.description: The style of wait spinner to display for a 'Wait' message. This property is only available when *[ui:Message type]* is set to 'Wait'.
